identity.mission: Create a modern, stylish fashion retail site using muted earth tones.

headings.usage: All section headings, hero titles, product names on detail page. Use tight tracking.

body.usage: Product descriptions, prices, buttons, navigation, small labels.

modes.hero: Tetris Grid (Mode A) - Asymmetric layout with large dominant imagery.
modes.listing: High Density Grid (Mode B) - 3 or 4 columns, minimal chrome.
modes.detail: Split Screen - Fixed image gallery on left, scrollable details on right.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 px-8 py-3 rounded-full uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white px-8 py-3 rounded-full uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold transition-all duration-300

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain overlay on solid backgrounds to avoid 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/60 border border-white/20 shadow-sm (Use for sticky headers and modals)
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: All interactive elements must have hover states (opacity change, scale, or underline growth).

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build 'HFashion' as a premium, grounded retail experience. The code must be clean, modular, and use the Shadcn components available in /app/frontend/src/components/ui.
instructions_to_main_agent.medallia: Add a placeholder for Medallia scripts in public/index.html head and body. Create a config file for Medallia settings if needed, but primarily ensure the window variables are accessible.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_setup: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom color palette provided in the 'colors' section. Do NOT use the default shadcn slate colors. Override them with these warm earth tones.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize Shadcn components. Remove the default radius if it's too small, increase it to 0.5rem or full pill shapes for buttons. Change focus rings to the primary color.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_rules: Use the Tetris Grid for the Homepage Hero. Use a sticky header with glassmorphism. Ensure strict accessibility contrast.
instructions_to_main_agent.demo_logic: Since there is no backend, simulate the 'LoggedIn' state. Hardcode a user profile in a context or global state. Mock the cart functionality with local state.

universal_guidelines.avoid_ai_slop: Do not make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry. Avoid 'Inter' font for headings.
universal_guidelines.animations: Use framer-motion for smooth entrance animations. Add 'group-hover' effects to all product cards.
universal_guidelines.data_test_ids: All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attributes (e.g., 'add-to-cart-btn', 'nav-link-home').
universal_guidelines.toasts: Use 'sonner' for all notifications (Added to cart, Order placed).
universal_guidelines.icons: Use lucide-react icons. Keep them thin (stroke-width={1.5}) for elegance.
